CustomField.formula: IF(AND(NokiaCPQ_Portfolio_From_Quote__c = 'Airscale Wifi', Quote_Type__c = 'Direct CPQ'),1, IF( ISNULL(VALUE(TEXT(Apttus_QPConfig__Proposald__r.NokiaCPQ_No_of_Years__c))) ,1, IF( Apttus_QPConfig__Proposald__r.NokiaCPQ_Is_Maintenance_Quote__c= true && TEXT(Apttus_QPConfig__Proposald__r.Warranty_credit__c)='No', VALUE(TEXT(Apttus_QPConfig__Proposald__r.NokiaCPQ_No_of_Years__c)), IF(VALUE(TEXT(Apttus_QPConfig__Proposald__r.NokiaCPQ_No_of_Years__c)) > 1,VALUE(TEXT(Apttus_QPConfig__Proposald__r.NokiaCPQ_No_of_Years__c))-1,1))))
CustomField.label: MaintQuantity
